%TbxCost_ToolTip%: Input the cost of Combat Bookshelf
%LblCardName_ToolTip%: Input the name for Combat Bookshelf
%TbxCardUniqueID_ToolTip%: Input the unique ID for Combat Bookshelf
%BtnCardImage_ToolTip%: Select the image that will be represented in Combat Bookshelf
%BtnCardEffect_ToolTip%: Select the ability for Combat Bookshelf
%BtnDropCards_ToolTip%: Input the books that will drop Combat Bookshelf
Chapter_ToolTip: Input chapter number that card to belong
PriorityEnemy_ToolTip: Input priority number that enemy will use when drawing cards
PriorityUser_ToolTip: Input priority number that user will be affected when drawing cards
PriorityScript_ToolTip: This script will be used for determining priority
EmotionLimit_ToolTip: Can be used when emotion level is over a specific level
WideAreaCode_ToolTip: This code can be used in a wide area card. This code will be automatically set
Type_FarAreaEach: Combat Bookshelf for far area each
Type_OnlyPage: OnlyPage - Only specific Key Page can use
%TbxMotion_ToolTip%: Input motion of dice (Right mouse button for direct input)
%TbxEffectRes_ToolTip%: Input motion script of dice (Right mouse button for direct input)
%TbxActionScript_ToolTip%: Input action script of dice (Right mouse button for direct input)
